name: Move! PC Edition
description:
Move! is a fun and addictive classic arcade-style dodge game. Test your reflexes by predicting the path of fiery projectiles and moving your tile out of their way before they touch you. 3 levels of difficulty allow you to start easy and work your way up to rapid-fire action. But time your moves right. One wrong move means game over!

HOW TO PLAY MOVE!

1) Select difficulty level (Easy Mode, Normal Mode, or Hard Mode)

2) Predict path of flaming projectiles

3) Move your tile up, down, left, or right to dodge

4) Rack up points the longer you stay in the game

FEATURES:

★ 3 levels of difficulty (Easy Mode, Normal Mode, or Hard Mode)
★ Simple, streamlined gameplay
★ Classic arcade-style graphics
★ Over 20 skins to customize your gaming experience!
